title: DO NOT CONDUCT POLLS DURING CRICKET WORLD CUP, APPEALS ARJUNA
content: Holding local government elections during the World Cup Cricket tournament is not the right thing to do, says parliamentarian Arjuna Ranatunga. He expressed these views at a media briefing this afternoon.“If the government is keen to develop the country and project a proper image, this is not the right time to hold local government elections….
